channel.title: Change drop rates? (dodian)

item.title: Change drop rates? (dodian)
item.dc:creator: @Zoft Zoft
item.description:
@Zoft wrote:

For servers like Dodian, Devolution, and Delta, you edit the drops in either drops.cfg or npcdrops.cfg in the config file. It usually goes, NPCID-ITEMID-ITEMAMOUNT-PERCENTAGE.

Read full topic

item.title: Change drop rates? (dodian)
item.dc:creator: @Owned239 Owned239
item.description:
@Owned239 wrote:

I was just wondering if there was any way to make the drop rate lower then 1%.
Iâ€™ve tried to use -1 and .01 in the npcdrops config. But neither work.
I have also tried to go into the npcdrop.java and change this:
public class NPCDrops {
public int DropType;
public int[] Items = new int[100];
public int[] ItemsN = new int[100];
public int npcId;

public NPCDrops(int _npcId) {
npcId = _npcId;
for (int i = 0; i < Items.length; i++) {
Items[i] = -1;
ItemsN = 0;
to something like this:
public class NPCDrops {
public int DropType;
public int[] Items = new int[1000];
public int[] ItemsN = new int[1000];
public int npcId;

public NPCDrops(int _npcId) {
npcId = _npcId;
for (int i = 0; i < Items.length; i++) {
Items = -1;
ItemsN = 0;
But it didnt work either. Any know how?

Read full topic
